name: Crime.io - Battle Royale
description:
Crime.io is the new hyper-casual game that you can not stop playing. Walk through this crime city full of gangsters and criminals while looking for weapons and resources to eliminate your enemies and become the Godfather of the city of crime.

Playing Crime.io is, besides fun, very easy and addictive; since to compete in the Battle Royale of this free game you only need one finger. Move through the city, collect weapons, aim at your enemies and kill them only with your thumb. It's all you need to play Crime.io and become the king of fast battles to the death.

The characters of Crime.io seem nice, but do not be fooled, they are the worst criminals, gangsters and terrorists in the city. They will take the slightest chance to hunt you down and eliminate you from the battle, so play your cards well and pose a good strategy to finish them off.

The battles of Crime.io begin with melee battles. Go out into the streets of the city armed with your gangster knife and stab any enemy that crosses your path in melee-type battles. Move quickly to find a remote weapon and take advantage of your enemies. You can find different types of lethal weapons, each with a different cadence and damage inflicted. Choose between pistols, submachine guns, UZI machine guns, shotguns, grenade launchers or bazookas.

Fight in different game modes and customize your favorite criminals:

- Battle Royale mode: death games of 20 players in which only one can be left. Kill your enemies to eliminate them from the battle and steal their resources. Will you be the most bloodthirsty criminal in the city?

- Versus mode: limited time games in which you will have to annihilate your enemies as many times as you can to get first. It is useless to hide, since in this way the most skilled, quick and ruthless criminal wins.

- Combine different skins to create your personalized gangster and build a reputation in the crime empire that makes your enemies tremble.

- Fight with different weapons to kill the criminals of the city. Pistols, submachine guns, UZI machine guns, shotguns, grenade launchers and bazookas.

- Protect yourself from enemy fire with the anti-bullet vests that are hidden by this city of crime.

Download Crime.io now for free, the next hyper-casual fashion game, and start the most bloodthirsty battle of all Battle Royale.
